data.title: Best Movies Like The Reef 2010
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The Reef: Black Water (2007), Open Water (2003), Open Water 2: Adrift (2006), Rogue (2007), 47 Meters Down (2017), Deep Blue Sea (1999), Open Water 3: Cage Dive (2017), Shark Night 3D (2011), The Shallows (2016), Backcountry (2014)
